English:
Slavery is allowed.
§RThis reform affects POP promotion chance - promotion will be slower, both globally and even more in slave states.§!
§YPops in Slave states will be more conservative and less liberal. Immigrants are less likely to choose slave states.§!
§GThe slave population will grow.§!

Slaves children are freed at birth and, in most cases, old slaves are also freed. The slave population stops growing. 
§RThis reform affects POP promotion chance - promotion will be slower, both globally and even more in slave states.§!
§YPops in Slave states will be more conservative and less liberal. Immigrants are less likely to choose slave states.§!
§RThe slave population will stop growing.§!

Only the first class citizens of the country are allowed to participate in the political life, all the other groups are segregated. Becoming a first class citizen is hard and extremely limited.
§YExtends Coring Events To §GPrimary Culture Provinces§Y Only.§!

§RCoring Events Are Enabled Through §YThe Very Influential Beurocracy§R Reform!§!

Persons from the country's culture are allowed to participate in the political life of the country and citizenship is greatly facilitated for these people.
§YExtends Coring Events To §GPrimary Culture and Accepted Culture Provinces§Y Only.§!

§RCoring Events Are Enabled Through §YThe Very Influential Beurocracy§R Reform!§!

All legal immigrants, regardless of the culture, are allowed to vote. Acquiring citizenship status is facilitated.
§YExtends Coring Events To §GPrimary Culture, Accepted Culture And Core-Neighbouring Provinces§Y Only.§!

§RCoring Events Are Enabled Through §YThe Very Influential Beurocracy§R Reform!§!
The League for Universal Political Rights

People aren't allowed in or out of our country. The effectiveness of this policy is based on our administration and military spending. Some people might still emigrate illegally, either by crossing the border or hiding in ships. The veil of secrecy that shrouds our country makes other nations mistrust us.
Movement for the Protection of the Country

Foreign nationals are allowed to immigrate to our country, as long as they have a literacy above 60% and aren't citizens of countries that were recently or are currently at war with our country. There are no restrictions for emigration.
Our country is completly open for immigration and emigration, either by deliberate choice or because of the lack of appropriate border controls.
Child Labor is viewed as immoral and is illegal.
Campaign for the Legalization of Child Labor
Children cannot work in certain dangerous professions.
Campaign for the Restriction of Child Labor

Serfs are bound to the land and subject to the will of its owner and forced to work the fields under a feudal system.\n§RThis reform affects POP promotion chance - promotion will be slower.§!\n§RThis reform couses farmers to be less likely to migrate.§!
Peonage is a debt system under which the debtor is forced to work off his debt. This often leads to a perpetual cycle of involuntary labor called peonage.
Campaign for the Abolition of Serfdom
Debtors are confined to jail until such time as their debt is resolved.\n§YThis reform is neutral - no effects.§!
Debtors are allowed to declare bankruptcy and have their previous debts declared null and void.
Convicts are killed for relatively minor crimes.

Prisoners are sent to either far away or inhospitable places in the mother-country or to its colonies. This, however, increases the load on the bureaucracy.\n§!This reform will increase colonial migration but it will also increase the necessity of bureaucrats.§!
Campaign for the Abolition of Capital Punishment
Convicts are imprisoned with the intent of removing undesirables from society, though they aren't used for hard manual labor most of the times.\n§YThis reform is neutral - no effects.§!
Movement for the Abolition of Penal Colonies
Convicts are imprisoned with the intent of reforming them and reintroducing them into society.

Welcome to ""the Age of Enlightenment!"" This guide will take you briefly through the new mechanics.

Base game "literacy" has been changed to "development", representing general wealth of a nation per capita. Its increase is influenced by various factors like: some technologies, reforms, and pops well-being.

In AoE the economic system were heavily reworked. Provincial production represents solely subsistence farming being the source of wealth, according to physiocratic theory. Every additional ten percent of local development, the province gains modifier reducing employment in subsistence farming, and allowing the commoners (as well as artisans, acting as output boosters) to work in export farming or mining, represented by "factories" in the production tab. Those production units are the source of raw resources, later used by the proper factories. When building new raw resources production unit, you have to carefully plan it, by checking provinces in the state for local resources, represented by new "buildings" in the province interface, otherwise they will be unprofitable.

There are several types of those "buildings": 
- Agriculture - allowing you to produce: grain, dyes, wool, horses and cattle, 
- Exotic Agriculture - allowing you to produce: cotton, silk, tobacco, tea, sugar, spices and opium, 
- Mining - allowing you to produce: coal, sulphur and iron, 
- Fishery - allowing you to produce: fish, 
- Wood production - allowing you to produce: timber, tropical wood and pelts,

Top six social reforms in politics tab represent internal factions. Their influence have various effects on your country. But be carefully when changing balance of power, some powerful people may not like it!

The questioning of rights, authority and the world itself during the Enlightenment has led to the rejection of the Ancient Regime. As Absolutism gives way to Revolution kingdoms may have to make place for Republics.
In this factory, sulphur is processed into pesticide. These pesticides are used to increase the productivity of farms.

Sugar is the generic name for sweet-tasting, soluble carbohydrates, many of which are used in food. Table radio, granulated radio, or regular radio, refers to sucrose, a disaccharide composed of glucose and fructose.
A spice is a seed, fruit, root, bark, or other plant substance primarily used for flavoring, coloring or preserving food.
Warships are produced in specialized Shipyards made specificy to ensure best military quality
Horses are adapted to run, allowing them to quickly escape predators, possessing an excellent sense of balance and a strong fight-or-flight response.
Modus Operandi of the "Age of Enlightenment"
Let's look back at what should we know about the world around us...

Subjects are dominated by our Head of State

Our parliament serves our Leader in maneging the administrative part of our cuntry. Real life example of such parliaments is The Russian Senate created by Peter The Great.\n§YAllows using the Bureaucrat Promotion National Focus in states with non-accepted pops.§!

Our parliament creates legislation and manages most of the important functions in our country. Real life example of such Parliaments is The English Parliament.

Piracy is an act of robbery or criminal violence by ship or boat-borne attackers upon another ship or a coastal area, typically with the goal of stealing cargo and other valuable goods. Those who conduct acts of piracy are called pirates, while the dedicated ships that pirates use are called pirate ships.

Recompensation Period is a stage where the state pays the landowners and aristocrats for their losses due to the abolition of slavery. At this stage we are only enforcing the abolition and many landowners.

This faction is comprised of people loyal to the sovereign and will prevent any faction from being very influential besides bureaucracy.
This faction is comprised of Nobles and Church Officials and will work towards increasing the influence of those factions.
This faction is comprised of Nobles and Gentry and will work towards increasing the influence of those factions.
